Articles.Content:
Hi there fellow Kerbonauts.

I started playing this awesome game for 2 weeks, mostly building rockets in VAB. Recently building planes with a lot more trial-and-error than rockets

But after reading tutorials, I getting a hang of it. So here you go, StrutKa 1 Light Attack Plane, armed with bombs, missiles, and cannons. It flies quite easily, with short take off run, decent speed and manuverability.

Here is some pictures:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download link for .craft file: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B8HoChXPmKpreWZHWjJpZGxadWM/view?usp=sharing

Edited March 24, 2015 by Theblekedet
Thanks. I inspired by Ju 87 inverted gull wings
